dcterms:description: A dataset for semantic urban scene understanding, providing pixel-level annotations for various object classes in urban environments.

dcterms:description: A dataset containing real images with pixel-level annotations to distinguish between out-of-distribution (OOD) objects and known classes.

dcterms:creator: Hermann Blum
Paul-Edouard Sarlin
Juan Nieto

dcterms:description: A benchmark dataset that measures blind spots in semantic segmentation by synthesizing unexpected objects into Cityscapes images.
dcterms:title: Fishyscapes Static (FS)

Krishna Nakka
Pascal Fua
Mathieu Salzmann
dcterms:description: A dataset containing real images with various out-of-distribution objects located on or near the road, mimicking traffic scenes.
dcterms:title: Road Anomaly (RA)

Hang Zhao
Xavier Puig
Sanja Fidler

dcterms:description: A dataset for scene parsing that includes a wide variety of object categories and is used for evaluating semantic segmentation methods.

dcterms:description: A dataset designed for developing and benchmarking active vision systems, focusing on various tasks related to object detection.
